text: We Chase the Waves is the second album by Chicago's Sundowner, the acoustic side-project from Chris McCaughan of The Lawrence Arms. The album was released on August 3, 2010. ==Track listing== #"In the Flicker" – 3:31 #"Araby" – 3:00 #"Whales and Sharks" – 2:56 #"As the Crow Flies" – 4:16 #"Baseball's Sad Lexicon" – 1:36 #"All Prologue" - 2:15 #"Mouth of a Tiger" – 4:33 #"Second Hand" – 1:44 #"Jewel of the Midwest" – 3:29 #"What Beadie Said" – 3:00 ==Personnel== * Chris McCaughan (vocals, acoustic guitars) Category:2010 albums Category:Asian Man Records
title: We Chase the Waves
